sellerCard.description:
Welcome to my profile!

I'm an innovative Website Developer with over four years of experience since 2020. I specialize in WordPress development, UI/UX design using Figma, and website creation across platforms like Webflow, Wix, and Shopify. My passion for development shines through in every project, ensuring quality, precision, and impact.

Communication is the key to my service. Iâ€™m here to answer any questions or provide guidance to make your ideas a reality.

Send me a message to explore how I can help bring your vision to life. Looking forward to connecting!

description.content:
Looking for a stunning Wix business website with a superfast turnaround?


In today's competitive landscape, having a standout online presence is not just an option, it's a necessity. And you've just discovered the perfect place to give your business that extra edge. We specialize in crafting and refining Wix websites, ensuring your business stays ahead of the curve


I hold a Bachelor's degree in Information and Technology. I have 4+ years of experience in web development and web design


Features:

  • Customized Wix Websites
  • Responsive Mobile Design
  • Wix Website Redesign
  • Premium Quality Images
  • Specialized Section Design
  • SEO Friendly Structure
  • E-commerce Solutions
  • Extensions Installation


Why ME:

  • Fast Responses.
  • Exceptional Communication Skills.
  • Commitment to Client Satisfaction.
  • Ongoing Support
  • 100% Professional Work
  • High-Quality Delivery


My Expertise:

Elementor - Webflow - Wix - ACF - WooCommerce - Landing Page - Elementor Pro - Theme Customization - Domain Hosting Setup - Figma UI/UX Design - WordPress Website


For more information check my portfolio once.

https://www.fiverr.com/users/mr_darshanpatel/portfolio


Contact us to begin discussing your project today!

slide.name: design, develop or redesign your business wix website or landing page
design, develop or redesign your business wix website or landing page
design, develop or redesign your business wix website or landing page

questionsAndAnswers.question: What makes a Wix website special?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Wix websites are incredibly user-friendly. They offer professional features that are easy to use. Even with no prior knowledge, you can effortlessly edit your website. We provide a simple upload-and-edit system, or we can guide you with detailed notes

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need to provide for my Wix website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: For your Wix website, we'll need your logo, page names and content, any social media links, business details, and photos. Don't worry if you don't have pictures; we can supply free, relevant images for your site

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is the best way to share changes/revisions?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The client can prepare a detailed video or document explaining his required changes/ revisions. The Zoom meeting will not be possible to discuss anything about changes/revisions. If someone still requires then booking a paid consultation is required from my Profile page.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer Wix Coding or Wix Corvid services?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, our service focuses on designing static websites using Wix's available tools. We do not provide features that require Wix Coding

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you convert my existing website from another platform to Wix?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! We specialize in transitioning websites to Wix, ensuring a seamless and efficient transfer

questionsAndAnswers.question: Are your Wix designs mobile-responsive?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, all our designs are mobile-responsive. They look great on various devices, including iPhones and Android phones. The mobile version is finalized as the last step in our design process

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide domain registration and Wix premium subscriptions?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We do not offer domain registration or Wix subscription plans. Clients are required to purchase these separately, but we assist in connecting your domain with your premium Wix website

reviews.comment: Work with Darshan has been a pleasure! Such a talented guy and professional, I love that he make shure that the clients is happy and always do his best. I will definitely work with Darshan again and I recommend you to do that as well!

Darshan demonstrates excellent responsiveness and a proactive approach with clients, maintaining a polite demeanor throughout the project. There were some errors that I was able to communicate and he was able to address promptly.

seller_response.comment: Awesome experience! Smooth process and clear communication. Would happily work together again!
